sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, movie_info_idx mi_idx
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.kind_id  =  1 AND t.production_year  <  1987 AND mc.company_id  >  264 AND mc.company_type_id  =  1
